name: Quadrijet Transfer Spacetug
ability: Spacetug Tractor Array: Action: Choose a ship in your (firing arc) at range 1. That ship grains 1 tractor token, or 2 tractor tokens if it is in your (bullseye firing arc) at range 1.

pilots.name: Jakku Gunrunner
pilots.text: The Quadrijet transfer spacetug, commonly called a “Quadjumper”, is nimble in space and atmosphere alike, making it popular among both smugglers and explorers.

pilots.name: Unkar Plutt
pilots.caption: Miserly Portion Master
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there are one or more other ships at range 0, you and each other ship at range 0 gain 1 tractor token.
